name: HUMANS NOT INCLUDED
description:
HUMANS NOT INCLUDED

In a dystopian future where technology have taken over the planet, you work as a manager in a power plant. Which kind? Human batteries. Harvest energy from these puny humans, while stressfully connecting the correct batteries to the sockets to gain time, before your 10 seconds run out.

(For tutorial, press options in the menu. The menu is still under construction)

This game was made as part of the 48h gamejam: AAU Jam - Fall 2022 (LINK)

Won:

#1 Most fun to play

#1 Best Video game

Credits:

Lead design: Mathias K.

Graphics: Mathias K.

Programming: Frederik B.

Music:

Interceptor - Le Matos

她还想入非非呢 - 輕描淡寫
